title: If the internet was going to go down forever in 10 minutes and you are the only in the world who knew it, what would you do? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would send emails to everyone I know, all the news organizations, and every social media platform I can think of. And say that I will bring down the internet in 10 minutes unless they give me 10 BILLION dollars! Of course, no one will believe me, and no one will pay me. Then the Internet does, in fact go down. The I will email the same places and saw I now want 20 BILLION dollars to fix the Internet. In small bills. Sent to my private Island. EDIT: it’s been pointed out to me that once the Internet goes down, I can’t sent the emails. Humm… FedEx and USPS then?

Hope my daughter’s picture and video backup is up to date, because in 10 minutes you won’t be able to do much. In the mean time, I’d probably rush to get some cash, because I believe the ATM network has been migrating away from their original, dedicated networks, and now run over whatever they need (eg. 3G), but at some point they’ll have to hit the same infrastructure that Internet runs on.
